about_the_game:
In Quandary, a moral dilemma unfolds. As a doctor facing an unimaginable choice, you must make your emotional and logical self cooperate to find a solution, even when the law offers no answers.

Quandary is an intriguing 2D puzzle platformer where your character's internal struggle is brought to life. Your logic and empathy take form as two separate characters, moving in opposite directions, forcing you to strategically utilize both to navigate challenging puzzles.

Can you find harmony within this chaos and solve puzzles that seem impossible, ultimately deciding the fate of your suffering patient?

You control two bodies that move in opposite directions!
You control two bodies that move in opposite directions and represent your empathy and logic.


Follow the light with your conscience!
Solve puzzles to reach the light.


Make your logic and empathy cooperate!


If he dies, you die.
Duh, he is you, and you are him...

Join Our Discord!

name: Quandary

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070

short_description: Quandary is a 2D puzzle platformer where you navigate puzzles with two separate characters, each embodying a side of your conscience and moving in opposite directions, Can you find harmony within this inner chaos and solve puzzles that seem impossible?
supported_languages: English, German, Swedish, Turkish, Polish, Italian, Czech, Greek, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, French
